SA10n1066:1: atrāha - yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna tattvam,
SA10n1066:2: kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām ,
SA10n1066:5: ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
SA10n1066:13: kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānu palambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate,
SA10n1066:16: sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā?
SA10n1066:17: ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha -
SA10n1066:20: kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ,
SA10n1066:22: yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
SA10n1066:23: ata eva anyatra nirdiṣṭatvānna punariha nirdiśyante |
SA10n1066:26: tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti,
SA10n1066:39: dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt ||
SA10n1066:44: ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate ||
SA10n1066:45: evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati |
SA10n1066:49: yathā hi goranyo'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati,
SA10n1066:52: tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt |
SA10n1066:54: saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate,
SA10n1066:57: athavā | ayamanyo'rthaḥ - yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt,
SA10n1066:60: ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10n1066:64: nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate,
SA10n1066:66: yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre -
SA10n1066:73: na punaste svarūpata ātmānamupalabhya tasya lakṣaṇamācakṣate,
SA10n1066:74: kiṃ tarhi yathāvadupādāyaprajñaptyanavagamena nāmamātrakamevātmānaṃ trāsādapratipadyamānāḥ saṃvṛtisatyādapi paribhraṣṭā mithyākalpanayaiva kevalamanumānābhāsamātravipralabdhāḥ santaḥ mohāt parikalpayanti ātmānam,
SA10n1066:76: teṣāṃ ca karmakārakaparīkṣādiṣu ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ bruvatā saṃvṛtyāpi pratiṣedho vihita eva | uktaṃ ca -
SA10n1066:78: dṛśyate nāma taccaiva na kiṃcidapi tattvataḥ ||
SA10n1066:86: upādāya prajñapyamāna eva avidyāviparyāsānu gatānāmātmābhiniveśāspadabhūto mumukṣubhirvicāryate,
SA10n1066:87: yasyedaṃ skandhapañcakamupādānatvena pratibhāsate kimasau skandhalakṣaṇaḥ uta askandhalakṣaṇaḥ iti |
SA10n1066:88: sarvathā ca vicārayanto mumukṣavo nainamupalabhante bhāvasvabhāvataḥ | tadā eṣām -
SA10n1066:91: yathaiva hi dagdhe rathe tadaṅgānyapi dagdhatvānnopalabhyante,
SA10n1066:96: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ ||
SA10n1066:99: yathaiva hi grīṣme madhyāhnakālāvasānamāsāditasya vidhananabhomadhyadeśamācikraṃso rīṣatparibhramyamānapaṭutarahutabhugvitatasphuliṅgāniva virūkṣataramahīmaṇḍalottāpanaparān pradīptakiraṇasya kiraṇān pratītya virūkṣataramavanideśaṃ cāsādya viparītaṃ ca darśanamapekṣya salilākārā marīcaya upalabhyamānā vidūradeśāvasthitānāṃ janmavatāmatiprasannābhinīlajalākāraṃ pratyayamādadhati na tu tatsamīpagatānām,
SA10n1066:100: evamihāpi yathāvasthitātmātmīyapadārthatattvadarśanavidūradeśāntarasthitānāṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamānānāmavidyāviparyāsānugamānmṛṣārtha eva skandhasamāropaḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ padārthatattvadarśanasamīpasthānāṃ na pratibhāsate |
SA10n1066:103: marīciryadi vāri syādāsannaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate ||
SA10n1066:108: ata eva ca ātmātmīyānupalambhātparamārthadarśanasamīpastho yogī niyataṃ bhavati -
SA10n1066:113: ātmano'haṃkāraviṣayasya ātmanīnasya ca skandhādervastunaḥ mamakāraviṣayasya śamādanutpādādanupalambhānnirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca jāyate yogī ||2 ||
SA10n1066:114: nanu ca yo'sāvevaṃ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca yogī bhavati,
SA10n1066:116: sati ca tasmin siddha ātmā skandhāśceti naitadevam | yasmāt -
SA10n1066:117: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so'pi na vidyate |
SA10n1066:118: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati ||3 ||
SA10n1066:119: ātmani skandheṣu ca sarvathānupalabhyamānasvarūpeṣu kutastadvayatirikto'parapadārtho bhaviṣyati yo'sau nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśceti |
SA10n1066:120: yastu evamasaṃvidyamānasvarūpaṃ nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ ca paśyati,
SA10n1066:124: na vidyate so'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām ||
SA10n1066:131: so'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
SA10n1066:143: satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ sarvakleśāḥ sūtre uktāḥ |
SA10n1066:147: yataśca ayaṃ janmanivṛttikramaḥ evaṃ vyavasthāpitaḥ, tasmāt -
SA10n1066:150: upādāne hi kṣīṇe tatpratyayo bhavo na bhavati |
SA10n1066:151: bhave niruddhe kuto jātijarāmaraṇādikasya saṃbhava iti |
SA10n1066:153: karmakleśānāṃ tarhi kasya kṣayātparikṣaya iti vaktavyam || ucyate -
SA10n1066:156: ayoniśo hi rūpādikaṃ vikalpayato bālapṛthagjanasya kleśa upajāyate rāgādikaḥ vakṣyati hi -
SA10n1066:160: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase |
SA10n1066:161: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi ||iti ||
SA10n1066:164: sa cāyaṃ laukikaḥ prapañco niravaśeṣa śūnyatāyāṃ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyatādarśane sati nirudhyate |
SA10n1066:166: yasmātsati hi vastunaṃ upalambhe syād yathoditaprapañcajālam |
SA10n1066:167: na hi anupalabhya vandhyāduhitaraṃ rūpalāvaṇya yauvanavatīṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti rāgiṇaḥ |
SA10n1066:168: na ca anavatārya prapañcaṃ tadviṣayamayoniśo vikalpamavatārayanti |
SA10n1066:169: na ca anavatārya kalpanājālam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭi mūlakān kleśagaṇānutpādayanti |
SA10n1066:170: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayātmakān kleśagaṇān karmāṇi śubhāśubhāniñjyāni kurvanti |
SA10n1066:171: na ca akurvāṇāḥ karmāṇi jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasya [upāyāsādirūpaṃ] ekajālībhūtaṃ saṃsārakāntāramanubhavanti |
SA10n1066:172: evaṃ yogino'pi śūnyatādarśanā vasthā niravaśeṣaskandhadhātvāyatanāni svarūpato nopalabhante |
SA10n1066:173: na ca anupalabhamānā vastusvarūpaṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti |
SA10n1066:174: na ca anavatārya tadviṣayaṃ prapañcaṃ vikalpamavatārayanti |
SA10n1066:175: na ca anavatārya vikalpam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakaṃ kleśagaṇamutpādayanti |
SA10n1066:176: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayādikaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti |
SA10n1066:178: tadevam aśeṣaprapañcopaśamaśivalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāmāgamya yasmādaśeṣakalpanājāla prapañcavigamo bhavati,
SA10n1066:185: ācāryabhāvavivekastu śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yathoditaśūnyatādhigamamapratipadyamānaḥ evaṃ varṇayati - aparotpannapratikṣaṇavinaśvarasaṃskārakalāpamātramanātmānātmīyamavalokayataḥ āryaśrāvakasyāpi ātmātmīyavastvabhāvād dharmamātramidaṃ jāyate mriyate ceti darśanamutpadyate |
SA10n1066:188: tadabhāvādeva na kkacidādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu astīti mamakārānutpatteḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāro'hamiti na svarūpaviniścitirupajāyate,
SA10n1066:190: prāgeva ajātasarvasaṃskāradarśināṃ nirvikalpaprajñācāravihāriṇāṃ mahābodhiṃsattvānāmiti | ata āha -
SA10n1066:191: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so'pi na vidyate ||iti ||
SA10n1066:192: tadayamācāryo yathaivaṃvidhe viṣaye nācāryapādamatānuvartī tathā pratipāditaṃ madhyamakāvatāre -
SA10n1066:197: pratyeka bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
SA10n1066:198: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamityādi ||
SA10n1066:202: imu kṣānti nāgatya na śakyati pāpuṇotuṃ
SA10n1066:207: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
SA10n1066:208: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
SA10n1066:209: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
SA10n1066:210: ātmā hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca ||
SA10n1066:219: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ | iti ?
SA10n1066:220: tathā hi - rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavānnāpi cātmā rūpe nātmā nātmani rūpaṃ ||
SA10n1066:222: vijñānavānnātmā vijñāne nātmā nātmani vijñānam iti |
SA10n1066:229: atra cāyamabhiprāyaḥ - iha ye [ātmābhāvaviparyāsa] kudarśanadhanatimirapaṭalāvacchāditāśeṣa buddhinayanatayā laukikāvadātadarśanaviṣayānatikrāntamapi bhāvajātamapaśyanto vyavahārasatyāvasthitā eva santaḥ kṣitisalilajvalanapavanābhidhānatattvamātrānuvarṇanaparā mūlaudanodakakiṇvādidravya viśeṣaparipākamātrapratyayotpannamadamurcchādisāmarthyaviśeṣānugatamadyapānopalambhavat kalalādimahābhūta paripākamātrasaṃbhūtā eva buddhīranuvarṇayantaḥ pūrvāntāparāntāpavādapravṛttāḥ santaḥ paralokamātmānaṃ cāpavadante - nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ,
SA10n1066:234: teṣāṃ tadasadṛṣṭinivṛttyartha caturaśīticittacaritasahasrabhedabhinnasya sattvadhātoryathāśayānuvartakairaśeṣasattvadhātūttāraṇākṣipta pratijñāsaṃpādanatatparaiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāsaṃbhārapuraḥ sarairnirupamairekajagadbandhubhirniravaśeṣakleśamahāvyādhi cikitsakairmahāvaidyarājabhūtairhīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanānujidhṛkṣayā hīrnānāṃ vineyānāmakuśalakarma kāriṇāmakuśalādi nivartayituṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ kkacidātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ loke vyavasthāpitam |
SA10n1066:237: madhyamakāvatārācca vistareṇa veditavyeti tatpratiṣedhārtha neha punaryatna āsthīyate ||
SA10n1066:238: ye tu sadbhūtātmadṛṣṭikaṭhinātidīrghaśithilamahāsūtrabaddhā vihaṃgamā iva sudūramapi gatāḥ kuśala karmakāriṇo'kuśalakarmapathavyāvṛttā api na śaknuvanti traidhātukabhavopapattimativāhya śivamajaramamaraṇaṃ nirvāṇapuramabhigantum,
SA10n1066:239: teṣāṃ madhyānāṃ vineyānāṃ satkāyadarśanābhiniveśaśithilīkaraṇāya nirvāṇābhilāṣasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirvineyajanānugrahacikīrṣubhiranātmetyapi deśitam ||
SA10n1066:240: ye tu pūrvābhyāsaviśeṣānugatagambhīradharmādhimokṣalabdhabījaparipākāḥ pratyāsannavartini nirvāṇe teṣāmutkṛṣṭānāṃ vineyānāṃ vigatātmasnehānāṃ paramagambhīramaunīndrapravacanārthatattvāvagāhana samarthānāmadhimuktiviśeṣamavadhārya -
SA10n1066:251: kāśyapa madhyamā pratipada dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā iti ||
SA10n1066:255: dṛṣṭaśrutādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditam |
SA10n1066:257: yataścaivaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanāśayanānātvena ātmānātmatadubhayapratiṣedhena buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā,
SA10n1066:261: sarvasya vāraṇaṃ paścādyo jānīte sa buddhimān || iti ||
SA10n1066:269: athavā - ayamanyo'rthaḥ - ātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ sāṃkhyādibhiḥ pratikṣaṇavinaśvarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāvamutprekṣya |
SA10n1066:270: anātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ lokāyatikaiḥ upapattyā ātmānaṃ saṃsartāramapaśyadbhiḥ -
SA10n1066:273: ityādinā | taimirikopalabdhakeśamaśakādiṣviva vitaimirikairiva bālajanaparikalpitātmānātmādi vastusvarūpaṃ sarvathaivāpaśyadbhiḥ -
SA10n1066:276: atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - upaśama upaśama iti bhagavannucyate,
SA10n1066:288: ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśama iti satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam iti śāntamate ye kecidārambaṇahetudṛṣṭisaṃyuktāḥ saṃkleśāḥ pravartante,
SA10n1066:293: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūle chinne sarvaśākhāpatraphalāni śuṣyanti,
SA10n1066:298: bhagavānāha- ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate sā dṛṣṭiradhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā,
SA10n1066:306: satkāya iti śāntamate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādadṛṣṭayā tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nodgṛhṇāti,
SA10n1066:309: na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti,
SA10n1066:312: tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate,
SA10n1066:324: tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca prajānāti,
SA10n1066:347: yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā,
SA10n1066:356: athavā | ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ - yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate iti,
SA10n1066:357: kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti ? ucyate |
SA10n1066:359: athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
SA10n1066:365: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha -
SA10n1066:369: yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
SA10n1066:371: asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati |
SA10n1066:372: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā?
SA10n1066:373: ekakṣaṇavāgudāhāreṇaiva tattajjanamanastamoharaṇī bahuvidhabuddhinalinīvanavibodhinī jarāmaraṇasaritsāgarocchoṣiṇī kalpakālānalasaptārkaraśmivisarahrepiṇī śaradaruṇamahāprabheti ||
SA10n1066:376: na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ ||
SA10n1066:379: pratiśrutkādayaḥ śabdā nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ |
SA10n1066:380: vāgapyevaṃ narendrasya nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ ||iti |
SA10n1066:382: devata codani dundubhi divya karmavipāka nivṛtta marūṇaṃ |
SA10n1066:383: deva pamattavihāriṇa ñātvā dundubhighoṣa pamuñci nabhāto ||
SA10n1066:384: sarva anitya aśāśvata kāmā itvara adhruva phenasabhāvāḥ |
SA10n1066:386: dundubhi vādita śakramarudbhiḥ sārddhaya saṃkrami dharmasabhāyām |
SA10n1066:387: dharmakathāṃ pakaroti marūṇāṃ yā katha śānta virāganukūlā ||
SA10n1066:394: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
SA10n1066:399: ekasvarā tu tava lokahito nānādhimukti svaru niścarati |
SA10n1066:400: ekaikamanvimamabhāṣi jino brūhi smitaṃ prakṛtakasya kṛte ||iti ||
SA10n1066:402: yasmāt kuśalākuśalaṃ karma kartāraṃ ca phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca lokaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyamiti bruvate |
SA10n1066:406: kutaḥ? pratītyasamutpādavādino hi mādhyamikāḥ hetupratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpannatvāt sarvameva ihalokaparalokaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ varṇayanti |
SA10n1066:407: yathā svarūpavādino naiva nāstikāḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād bhāvasvabhāvaśunyatvena na paralokādyabhāvaṃ pratipannāḥ |
SA10n1066:408: kiṃ tarhi aihalaukikaṃ vastujātamupalabhya svabhāvataḥ tasya paralokādihāgamanam,
SA10n1066:410: tathāpi vastusvarūpeṇa avidyamānasyaiva te nāstitvaṃ pratipannāḥ ityamunā tāvaddarśanena sāmyamastīti cet, na hi |
SA10n1066:415: yathā hi kṛtacaurya puruṣamekaḥ samyagaparijñāyaiva tadamitrapreritaḥ taṃ mithyā vyācaṣṭe cauryamanena kṛtamiti,
SA10n1066:420: ekaśca ayaśasā ca apuṇyena ca samyak parīkṣyamāṇo yujyate nāparaḥ,
SA10n1066:421: evamihāpi yathāvadviditavastusvarūpāṇāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ bruvatāmavagacchatāṃ ca vastusvarūpābhede'pi yathāvadaviditavastusvarūpairnāstikaiḥ saha jñānābhidhānayornāsti sāmyam |
SA10n1066:422: yathaiva hi upekṣāsāmānye'pi apratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya upekṣakayoriva pṛthagjanārhatoḥ jātyandhacakṣuṣmatośca viṣamaprapātapradeśaviniścitasāmānye'pi yathāsti mahān viśeṣaḥ,
SA10n1066:423: tathā nāstikānāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca viśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti pūrvācāryāḥ |
SA10n1066:428: tathāpi naivāsau adeśyamānā śakyā janairvijñātumiti avaśyaṃ tasyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ vineyajanānāṃ saṃvṛtisatyāpekṣayā kadāciddeśanānupūrvyā bhavitavyam,
SA10n1066:431: iyamatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāradeśanānupūrvī vijñeyā, yaduta -
SA10n1066:432: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca |
SA10n1066:436: na hi pratihataḥ pātraṃ saddharmasya kathaṃcana ||iti |
SA10n1066:445: nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā |
SA10n1066:446: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā ||
SA10n1066:447: ityādita eva tāvadbhagavatā svaprasiddhapadārthamedasvarūpavibhāgaśravaṇasaṃjātābhilāṣasya vineyajanasya yadetat skandhadhātvāyatanādikamavidyātaimirikaiḥ satyataḥ parikalpitamupalabdham,
SA10n1066:451: yaḥ evaṃ bhavāgraparyantasya vāyumaṇḍalāde rākāśadhātuparyavasānasya bhājanalokasya sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ sāsvādaṃ sādīnavaṃ copadiṣṭavāniti |
SA10n1066:452: tadevaṃ bhagavati utpanna sarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam |
SA10n1066:453: tatra tathyaṃ nāma yasya anyathātvaṃ nāsti |
SA10n1066:458: keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam |
SA10n1066:462: keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam |
SA10n1066:463: tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadāta śyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham ||
SA10n1066:464: etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam - unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam |
SA10n1066:467: sarvāścaitā deśanā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇopāyajñānavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāropāyatvena vyavasthitāḥ |
SA10n1066:469: vyādhyanurūpabhaiṣajyopasaṃhāravat te vineyajanānujighṛkṣayā yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
SA10n1066:474: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ tat tattvaṃ yasyaitā deśanā avatārārthamupadiśante bhagavantaḥ ?
SA10n1066:480: tathāpi vyavahārasatyānurodhena laukikatathyādyabhyupagamavat tasyāpi samāropato lakṣaṇamucyatāmiti | taducyate -
SA10n1066:486: yathā hi taimirikā vitathaṃ keśamaśakamakṣikādirūpaṃ paśyanto vitimiropadeśenāpi na śaknuvanti keśānāṃ yathāvadavasthitaṃ svarūpamadarśananyāyena adhigantavyamataimirikā ivādhigantum,
SA10n1066:488: yadā tu timiropadhātya viparītaśūnyatādarśanāñjanāñjitabuddhinayanāḥ santaḥ samutpannatattvajñānā bhavanti,
SA10n1066:490: evamaparapratyayaṃ bhāvānāṃ yat svarūpaṃ tat tattvam |
SA10n1066:509: mañjuśrīrāha - yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca,
SA10n1066:519: yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam,
SA10n1066:520: yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
SA10n1066:521: evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate ||
SA10n1066:522: devaputra āha - katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti?
SA10n1066:523: mañjuśrīrāha - paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarva dharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
SA10n1066:525: paramārthato nirvāṇā nānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya |
SA10n1066:543: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
SA10n1066:546: tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate,
SA10n1066:547: na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum |
SA10n1066:548: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ,
SA10n1066:556: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate |
SA10n1066:563: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate,
SA10n1066:566: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum |
SA10n1066:571: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
SA10n1066:572: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
SA10n1066:577: mahākaruṇopāyamahāmeghapaṭalanirantarāvacchāditākāśadhātuparyantadiṅmaṇḍalānāṃ rāgādikleśagaṇasamudācārātitīkṣṇatarādityamaṇḍalopatāpitajagajjātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhadahanasaṃtāpopaśamatatparāṇāṃ satatāviratayathānurūpacaritapratipakṣasaddharmadeśanāmṛtadhārāpātaiḥ yathānurūpavineyajanakuśalamūlaśasyau - ṣadhiphalaphullalatotpannātivṛddhayanujidhṛkṣūṇāṃ saddharmāmṛtamahāvarṣavarṣiṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamahānāgānāmatrāṇālaukikatrāṇānāmanāthanāthānāṃ sakalalokanāthānāmetat tatsaddharmāmṛtaṃ sakalatraidhātukabhavaduḥkhakṣaya svabhāvaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam |
SA10n1066:578: etaddharmatattvāmṛta pratipannānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ śrutacintābhāvanākramāt pravartamānānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakaskandhatrayāmṛta rasasya upayogānniyatameva jarāmaraṇakṣayasvabhāvanirvāṇādhigamo bhavati |
SA10n1066:579: athāpi kathaṃcidiha aparipakka kuśalamūlatayā śrutvāpyetat saddharmāmṛtam,
SA10n1066:581: tathāpi janmāntare'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate |
SA10n1066:593: tasmādasaṃsargāddhetoḥ pratyekabuddhā nāmasaṃbuddhake'pi kāle yasmādbhavatyeva dharmatattvādhigamaḥ,
SA10n1066:594: tasmādabandhyā siddhirasya saṃbuddhamahāvaidyarāja praṇītasya saddharmatattvāmṛtabhaiṣajyasyeti vijñeyam |
SA10n1066:596: ato'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti |
SA10n1066:598: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
SA10n1066:599: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā |
SA10n1066:600: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto'bhūt - gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi |
SA10n1066:602: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
SA10n1066:605: yāvat mā kkaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā |
SA10n1066:613: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi |
SA10n1066:622: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam |
SA10n1066:625: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet |
SA10n1066:627: varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet,
SA10n1066:629: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ,
SA10n1066:631: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi ||
SA10n1066:632: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata - tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorekāgramanasikārasya bhikṣoḥ |
SA10n1066:633: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā,
